TopicTitle: switching the forums back to mobile mode on my phone

Articles.Content: I was on break at work, viewing the forums to pass the time, and noticed that I could not see any poll results. So I went to the bottom of the page and clicked view full page, and that let me see the poll I wanted. But now I am still stuck in full site mode, which is not optimal on my tiny phone screen. How can I switch back to the mobile version?
Should be an option on your mobile phones browser.. check its menu key/icons.
Scroll all the way to the bottom and you should see a little drop-down saying "default style". See if you can switch that to "default mobile style" if sjwt's method doesn't work.

> 
> Scroll all the way to the bottom and you should see a little drop-down saying "default style". See if you can switch that to "default mobile style"

That fixed it, many thanks. been stuck on full site on my phone for the past month ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)![:rolleyes:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_rolleyes.gif)
